examples.description: can be created with valid data
examples.full_description: Recipe can be created with valid data

examples.description: is expected to validate that :title cannot be empty/falsy
examples.full_description: Recipe validations is expected to validate that :title cannot be empty/falsy

examples.description: is expected to validate that the length of :instructions is at least 50
examples.full_description: Recipe validations is expected to validate that the length of :instructions is at least 50

examples.description: returns an array of recipes with their associated users
examples.full_description: Recipes GET /recipes with a logged in user returns an array of recipes with their associated users

examples.description: returns an array of error messages in the body
examples.full_description: Recipes GET /recipes with no logged in user returns an array of error messages in the body
Recipes GET /recipes with no logged in user returns a 401 (Unauthorized) HTTP status code

examples.description: creates a new recipe in the database
examples.full_description: Recipes POST /recipes with a logged in user and valid data creates a new recipe in the database

examples.description: returns the new recipe along with its associated user
examples.full_description: Recipes POST /recipes with a logged in user and valid data returns the new recipe along with its associated user
Recipes POST /recipes with a logged in user and valid data returns a 201 (Created) HTTP status code

examples.description: does not create a new recipe in the database
examples.full_description: Recipes POST /recipes with a logged in user and invalid data does not create a new recipe in the database

examples.description: returns an array of validation error messsages
examples.full_description: Recipes POST /recipes with a logged in user and invalid data returns an array of validation error messsages

examples.description: returns a 422 (Unprocessable Entity) HTTP status code
examples.full_description: Recipes POST /recipes with a logged in user and invalid data returns a 422 (Unprocessable Entity) HTTP status code

examples.description: returns an array of error messages in the body
examples.full_description: Recipes POST /recipes with no logged in user returns an array of error messages in the body
Recipes POST /recipes with no logged in user returns a 401 (Unauthorized) HTTP status code
